title: Trump tariffs leave importers with record-breaking $3.5 billion U.S. Customs bond funding shortfall
summary_full: U.S. Customs identified close to $3.6 billion in surety bond insufficiencies in fiscal 2025, a financial guarantee trade experts say has soared due to tariffs.
summary_public: U.S. Customs identified close to $3.6 billion in surety bond insufficiencies in fiscal 2025, a financial guarantee trade experts say has soared due to tariffs.
